products.name: Celana pendek boxer
products.link: /* Reset dan Base Styles */ * {     margin: 0;     padding: 0;     box-sizing: border-box; }  body {     font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;     line-height: 1.6;     color: #333;     background-color: #f8f9fa;     overflow-x: hidden; }  .container {     max-width: 1200px;     margin: 0 auto;     padding: 15px; }  /* Header */ .header {     text-align: center;     padding: 20px 0; }  .header h1 {     font-size: 1.8rem;     color: #2c3e50;     margin-bottom: 10px; }  /* Gambar Utama */ .main-image-container {     width: 100%;     max-width: 600px;     margin: 0 auto 20px;     border-radius: 10px;     overflow: hidden;     box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); }  .main-image {     width: 100%;     height: 200px;     object-fit: cover;     display: block; }  /* Teks */ .welcome-text {     text-align: center;     font-size: 1.4rem;     color: #27ae60;     margin: 15px 0;     font-weight: 600; }  .instruction {     text-align: center;     color: #7f8c8d;     margin-bottom: 20px;     font-size: 1rem; }  /* Search */ .search-container {     max-width: 500px;     margin: 0 auto 25px; }  .search-box {     display: flex;     background: white;     border-radius: 25px;     padding: 8px 15px;     box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);     align-items: center; }  .search-box i {     color: #7f8c8d;     margin-right: 10px; }  .search-box input {     flex: 1;     border: none;     outline: none;     font-size: 1rem;     padding: 8px;     background: transparent; }  .search-btn {     background: #3498db;     color: white;     border: none;     padding: 8px 20px;     border-radius: 20px;     cursor: pointer;     font-weight: 600;     transition: background 0.3s; }  .search-btn:hover {     background: #2980b9; }  /* Kategori Horizontal */ .categories-section {     margin-bottom: 25px; }  .categories-section h2 {     font-size: 1.3rem;     margin-bottom: 15px;     color: #2c3e50; }  .categories-scroll {     overflow-x: auto;     padding-bottom: 8px;     -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch; }  .categories-scroll::-webkit-scrollbar {     height: 4px; }  .categories-scroll::-webkit-scrollbar-track {     background: #f1f1f1;     border-radius: 2px; }  .categories-scroll::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {     background: #3498db;     border-radius: 2px; }  .categories-container {     display: flex;     gap: 10px;     padding: 5px;     min-width: min-content; }  .category-item {     background: white;     padding: 10px 18px;     border-radius: 20px;     box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);     cursor: pointer;     transition: all 0.3s;     font-weight: 500;     white-space: nowrap;     flex-shrink: 0;     border: 1px solid #e1e5eb;     font-size: 0.9rem; }  .category-item:hover {     background: #3498db;     color: white;     border-color: #3498db; }  .category-item.active {     background: #2c3e50;     color: white;     border-color: #2c3e50; }  /* Produk List Simple */ .products-section {     margin-bottom: 30px; }  .products-section h2 {     font-size: 1.3rem;     margin-bottom: 20px;     color: #2c3e50; }  .products-list {     background: white;     border-radius: 10px;     overflow: hidden;     box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); }  .product-item {     display: flex;     align-items: center;     padding: 15px;     border-bottom: 1px solid #eaeaea;     text-decoration: none;     color: inherit;     transition: all 0.2s; }  .product-item:last-child {     border-bottom: none; }  .product-item:hover {     background-color: #f8f9fa;     transform: translateY(-1px);     box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); }  .product-info {     flex: 1;     display: flex;     align-items: center;     gap: 15px;     min-height: 60px; }  .product-number {     font-weight: bold;     color: #3498db;     font-size: 1rem;     min-width: 40px;     flex-shrink: 0; }  .product-name {     flex: 1;     font-size: 1rem;     color: #2c3e50; }  .product-name > div:first-child {     margin-bottom: 5px;     font-weight: 500; }  .product-thumbnail {     width: 60px;     height: 60px;     border-radius: 8px;     overflow: hidden;     flex-shrink: 0;     background: #f8f9fa;     display: flex;     align-items: center;     justify-content: center;     border: 1px solid #eaeaea; }  .product-thumbnail img {     width: 100%;     height: 100%;     object-fit: cover;     transition: transform 0.3s; }  .product-item:hover .product-thumbnail img {     transform: scale(1.05); }  .product-thumbnail i {     font-size: 24px;     color: #bdc3c7; }  .product-category {     font-size: 0.75rem;     color: #6c757d;     background: #e9ecef;     padding: 3px 10px;     border-radius: 12px;     display: inline-block;     font-weight: 500; }  /* Loading indicator for thumbnails */ .product-thumbnail.loading {     animation: pulse 1.5s infinite; }  @keyframes pulse {     0% { opacity: 0.6; }     50% { opacity: 1; }     100% { opacity: 0.6; } }  /* Platform badges */ .platform-badge {     font-size: 0.7rem;     padding: 2px 6px;     border-radius: 4px;     margin-left: 8px;     font-weight: 600; }  .shopee-badge {     background: #ee4d2d;     color: white; }  .tokopedia-badge {     background: #42b549;     color: white; }  .bukalapak-badge {     background: #e31e52;     color: white; }  .lazada-badge {     background: #0f146d;     color: white; }  .blibli-badge {     background: #00a2e3;     color: white; }  /* No Data */ .no-data {     text-align: center;     padding: 40px;     color: #6c757d;     font-size: 0.9rem; }  .no-data i {     font-size: 2rem;     margin-bottom: 10px;     color: #bdc3c7;     display: block; }  /* Footer */ .footer {     text-align: center;     padding: 15px;     border-top: 1px solid #dee2e6;     color: #6c757d;     margin-top: 30px;     font-size: 0.9rem; }  .admin-link {     display: inline-block;     margin-top: 8px;     color: #3498db;     text-decoration: none;     font-weight: 600; }  .admin-link:hover {     text-decoration: underline; }  /* Responsif */ @media (max-width: 768px) {     .container {         padding: 10px;     }          .header h1 {         font-size: 1.5rem;     }          .welcome-text {         font-size: 1.2rem;     }          .main-image {         height: 150px;     }          .product-item {         padding: 12px;     }          .product-number {         font-size: 0.9rem;         min-width: 35px;     }          .product-name {         font-size: 0.95rem;     }          .product-thumbnail {         width: 50px;         height: 50px;     }          .search-box {         padding: 6px 12px;     }          .search-btn {         padding: 6px 16px;         font-size: 0.9rem;     }          .product-category {         font-size: 0.7rem;         padding: 2px 8px;     } }  @media (max-width: 480px) {     .product-info {         flex-direction: column;         align-items: flex-start;         gap: 10px;     }          .product-name {         width: 100%;     }          .product-thumbnail {         align-self: flex-end;         position: absolute;         right: 12px;         top: 50%;         transform: translateY(-50%);     }          .category-item {         padding: 8px 14px;         font-size: 0.85rem;     }          .product-item {         position: relative;         padding-right: 70px; /* Space for thumbnail */     } }
